utils

Class Helper

  • java.lang.Object
    • utils.Helper

  • public class Helper
extends java.lang.Object
    A class only with static method. This methods should return a json frame which is needed all over the project
    Author:
    Stefan Fuchs, Jan-Niklas Wortmann

    • Method Detail

      • getJsonFrame

        public static org.json.JSONObject getJsonFrame(int status,
                                               java.lang.String message,
                                               org.json.JSONObject body,
                                               java.lang.String event)
        creates and returns a JSONObject of the given parameters e.g. {"status": 0, "message": "ok", "event": "login_response", "body": {}}
        Parameters:
        status - the status of the JSON (Integer)
        message - the message of the JSON (String)
        body - the body of the JSON (JSONObject)
        event - the event of the JSON (String)
        Returns:
        returns the created JSONObject

      • getWinnerJSON

        public static org.json.JSONObject getWinnerJSON(User user,
                                                Card[] cards,
                                                int value)
        Creates and returns a JSONObject with the given parameters e.g. {"value" : 1, "user": USEROBJECT, "cards": CARDSOBJECT}
        Parameters:
        user - the user put into the jsonobject
        cards - the card put into the jsonobject
        value - the value put into the jsonobject
        Returns:
        a jsonobject representing the winner of a game
